title: 115_s2227
content: Ensuring Medicaid Provides Opportunities for Widespread Equity, Resources, and Care Act or the EMPOWER Care Act This bill amends the Deficit Reduction Act of 2005 to extendnbsp, fundingnbsp, throughnbsp, FY2022 fornbsp. The Money Follows the Person Rebalancing Demonstration Program and to otherwise revise the program.
